starter noun
(IN SPORTS ETC)
[ C ] a person, animal, or organization that takes part in an activity, especially a race, when it begins: Of the ten starters (= horses that started in the race), two fell at the first fence.
a person who gives the signal to start a race: They all wait for the crack of the starter's pistol. The starter waved the green flag and 43 cars raced past the grandstand. He was convinced that the race starter had allowed one of the runners to go early.
